question: What was the citadel on top of the fort was called during the rule of Qutb Shahi's kings?
explanation: The citadel on top of the fort during the rule of Qutub Shahis was known as the Bala Hissar. It was generally the residence of the Qutb Shahi kings. The other places of interest inside the fort include the offices of Akkanna and Madanna.
